𒄬 ≈ 𒐀 late form

𒄬 ḪAL < 𒄬𒄬 kullern
𒄬 ḪAL 𒄬 half 𜎾 hal ⇔ 𒈦≠𒑏 = 1/2 𓏶 MAŠ ⇔ DEMI?
𒄬 halt in 𒀜𒄬 adhal't 𐎘𐎍𐎘 ṯlṯ tilt "copper" lith?
𒄬 half = demi “divide” => deal out, distribute, extispicy

𒄬 demi ≈ medi 𒀜𒄬 ma.ad мед med "copper" ≈ 𒄬

𒄬 bur8 Furche fourche bifurcum √fork crotch ⇔ pubic (be)haara 叉

𒄬 bur₈ buru₈ peur fear Furcht #buluh
𒄬 buru₈™ part

Enigma! Seems more like a special marker / modifier than direct syllable

𒀜𒄬 adḫal "secret" ≈ adgal ≈ 𓂧 𓎼 𓀃 dagal duck deck verstecken √hide
𒀜𒄬 copper see there for special readings

𒁁 ⋍ 𒉽𒄬 •podᵐᵃ paʳdemi (pap-halᶠ) foot/calf

𒄬 ḪAL half 𒈦 ḪAL.BA 𒉽

𒄬 hal; 𒄩𒀠 ha-al “country” 𒄬 ⋍ 𒆳 @ Elamite
𒄬 ḪAL < 𒆳 KUR
𒄬 hal < ḪAL hill < ḫal 𜎺 ḫul < gal gul < kul < kur 𒆳

country 𒄬;𒄩𒀠 hal; ha-al hill hall highland 𒄬 < 𒆳 kur Elam "elevated"
city, town 𒀀𒀠 a-al hall 𒄬 < UR < 𒆳 kur

ʰElam

Hebrew עֵילָם ʿēlām
Akkadian 𒉏𒈠𒆠 ELAM.MAKI /elamtu/
Elamite 𒄬𒆷𒁶𒋾 ḫalla-tam₆-ti /haltamti/
Linear 𜎾𜎅𜏂𜏔𜎅𜏧 •Halʿtamʿti
Linear 𜎽𜏂𜓝𜏧 Hatamti La Medina 𜓟 𓋬 "Middle Earth" => Medes
Tamʿti 𜑝 Temi Demi Semi 𜑝 ≈ 𒋁 ŠEŠ2 Susa 𒂞 EREN Iran Elam

𒄬𒇷 ḥalli kill "destroy"

DEMI

𒄬 ḪAL half ⇔ 𒁶 tam₆ ⇔ DEMI?
𒄬𒁍 ḫal-pu palūdem! phylo reverse
𒄬𒁍 forest, frost, ice # forest ⋍ frost !

Demi Tamʿti

Hebrew עֵילָם ʿēlām
Akkadian 𒉏𒈠𒆠 ELAM.MAKI /elamtu/
Elamite 𒄬𒆷𒁶𒋾 ḫalla-tam₆-ti /haltamti/
Linear 𜎾𜎅𜏂𜏔𜎅𜏧 •Halʿtamʿti
Linear 𜎽𜏂𜓝𜏧 Hatamti La Medina 𜓟 𓋬 "Middle Earth" => Medes
Tamʿti 𜑝 Temi Demi Semi 𜑝 ≈ 𒋁 ŠEŠ2 Susa 𒂞 EREN Iran Elam

𜎾 ≈ 𒄬 HAL as determinant or article 𒄬 < 𒆳 :

dog 𒄬𒆠𒉌 hal-ki-ni 𒌨 ḪUL.κύon 犬 quǎn chien

honey 𒄬𒆷𒆠 hal-la-ki hollaki ⇔ Honig (NL!) hingiv ھەنگوین henguyn
honey 𒄬𒆷𒆠 hal-la-ki ghallaki ⇔ galak milk miel μέλῐ méli 𐌼𐌹𐌻𐌹𐌸 miliþ մեղր mełr misk'i malab

𒄬 hal country 𒄩𒀠 hal; ha-al hill 𒄬 < 𒆳 kur "elevated"
𒄬 hal hill < tell

𒀜𒄬 #erûˢ Erz ad-hal "copper" Akk. erû ⇔ 𒍏 URUDˢ 𒔁 Erz

Akkadian words using 𒄬 ḫal⇔demi
𒄬𒁍 ḫal-pu palūdem! phylo reverse
𒄬𒁍 forest, frost, ice # forest ⋍ frost !

𒄬𒄬𒆷𒌅 ḫal-ḫal-la-tu
𒄬𒄬𒆷𒌅 a kind of drum

𒈲𒄬𒋛𒌅 muš-ḫal-si-tu
𒈲𒄬𒋛𒌅 slippery place?

𒈾𒄬𒇻 na-ḫal-lu
𒈾𒄬𒇻 gorge, stream, wadi

Elamite words using 𒄬 hal < gal < kal < kur 𒆳

13.240 half 𒎕𒉌;𒎕𒉡𒋗;𒎕𒉡𒁀 pír-ni; pír-nu-šu; pír-nu-ba portions палаві́на palavína √part parⁿ phần 分 반 ban 半分 (ja) (はんぶん, hanbun) upanɗe vier 4 𓇷 new noon ⇔ puolikas (fi) (of an object), puolet polovina (cs) f, půlka (cs) f, půl pʋsʋka Lithuanian: pusė fél ⇔ העלפֿט‎ helft halb <<++??
